sentences.en: And nothing was so irritating as the confident way he used archaic idiom.
sentences.cn: 没什么比他使用过时的方言时那种自负的神态更气人的了。

sentences.en: Archaic practices such as these are usually put forward by people of limited outlook.
sentences.cn: 视野狭隘的人通常会提出类似于这些的陈腐做法。

sentences.en: His prose, while less archaic than some critics have maintained has no new note in it.
sentences.cn: 他的散文虽不如某些评论家所说那样古奥,却也无新意.

sentences.en: In fact, the rules were as unrealistic as they were archaic.
sentences.cn: 实际上这些规章既陈旧又不现实。

sentences.en: In music also Bertha developed a taste for the half - known, the half archaic.
sentences.cn: 在音乐方面,伯莎也培养了一种欣赏那些半著声名 、 半带古风的作品的兴趣.

sentences.en: In practice the rules were as unrealistic as they were archaic.
sentences.cn: 实际上这些规章既陈旧又不现实.

sentences.en: Its tendency to archaic language was tempered by the indolence of its exponents.
sentences.cn: 它的应用古语的趋势却被用语者的懒散所冲淡.
我的这种感情类型已经陈旧过时了.

sentences.en: On the face of it, life was a mixture of the quaint and the archaic.
sentences.cn: 从表面上看来, 生活是离奇有趣的事物和古老事物的混合体.

sentences.en: Only then was it time to disinter the archaic weapons of the tribe.
sentences.cn: 这时才发掘出民族的武器.

sentences.en: That plane itself looks almost laughably archaic.
sentences.cn: 那架飞机真可笑,看起来简直像个老古董.

sentences.en: The company does some things in archaic ways, such as not using computers for bookkeeping.
sentences.cn: 这个公司有些做法陈旧, 如记账不使用电脑.

sentences.en: Their taste and style were archaic.
sentences.cn: 他们的情趣与风格都是古老的.
这里是布赖兹赫德,他这人有点古板.

sentences.en: Thou is an archaic form of you.

words.tran_cn: [语][生物]古代的；陈旧的；古体的；古色古香的

trans.tran_cn: 古代的，过时的，陈旧的，古体的，古色古香的
